tool_description: This API is designed to collect data on available Amazon promo codes. It updates quickly, ensuring users have access to the latest information.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Filters products from the database based on the search query provided by the user.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: The term to search for in the product database.

api_list.name: All products
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of all products available in the database along with their promo codes.
